category.name: NX
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_NX_CM_AutomatedDecision_Actions
preference.preference_description: The preference value describes the customizable behavior for a given object type with associated reason and actions. Values are in the format "ObjectType=object_type;Reason=reason;Actions=commands", where: object_type is the internal type reason associated with the modification on the object commands is the comma-separated list of commands.
